001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.providers;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.filter.SkipUntilTimestampFilter;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriber;
006import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberConfiguration;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
008
009import java.util.Optional;
010import java.util.function.Predicate;
011
012/**
013 * Base implementation for PersistentSubscriber that helps set up useful event filters.
014 */
015public abstract class BasePersistentSubscriber
016        implements PersistentSubscriber {
017
018    protected Predicate<WithMetadata<ArrayNode>> filter;
019
020    @Override
021    public void init(PersistentSubscriberConfiguration subscriberConfiguration) {
022        BasePersistentSubscriberConfiguration cfg = new BasePersistentSubscriberConfiguration(subscriberConfiguration.getConfiguration());
023        Predicate<WithMetadata<ArrayNode>> filter = wman -> true;
024
025        if (cfg.getSkipOld()) {
026            filter = new SkipUntilTimestampFilter(System.currentTimeMillis());
027        }
028
029        Optional<Long> skipUntil = cfg.getSkipUntil();
030        if (skipUntil.isPresent()) {
031            filter = new SkipUntilTimestampFilter(skipUntil.get());
032        }
033
034        this.filter = filter;
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public Predicate<WithMetadata<ArrayNode>> getFilter() {
039        return filter;
040    }
041}
